forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine to start, then a few afternoon clouds. High 14C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny to partly cloudy. High 56F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 7C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low near 45F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 13C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 56F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low around 10C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low near 50F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 7C. S winds shifting to NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 44F. S winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and damp with rain in the morning...then becoming partly cloudy. High around 10C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain ending early. Breaks of sun in the afternoon. High 49F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low around 5C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 41F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 9C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 49F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 4C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low near 40F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High around 10C. SSE winds shifting to WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High around 50F. SSE winds shifting to WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 4C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 39F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 11C. ESE winds shifting to NNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 51F. ESE winds shifting to NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low around 5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 41F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. High 13C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. High 54F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low near 5C. Winds ENE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 42F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 14C. Winds NNE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 58F. Winds NNE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low 6C. Winds ENE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 43F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 16C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 61F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 7C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 44F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.
